snippet.title: BEYOND ASTRA | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
KICKSTARTER is live! http://kck.st/4f5VSIT 
👉 Join us in celebrating Beyond Astra and help us finalize its development! 💫

Beyond Astra is a real-time 4X sci-fi grand strategy game. Expand your own civilization, explore captivating and mysterious planets and star clusters, interact with your citizens and other life forms and shape your destiny through nearly infinite possibilities.

WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2669060?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=web&utm_term=description&utm_content=reveal_trailer

JOIN US ON DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/cvZnUST

Official website: https://beyondastra.com
Reddit: https://reddit.com/r/beyondastra
Facebook: https://facebook.com/beyondastra
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@beyondastra
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/beyondastra.com
X: https://twitter.com/playbeyondastra

#beyondastra #nebulegames #realtimestrategy #strategy #strategygames #citybuilder #videogames #4x #space #scifi
